column4: 矢印の通りにコースを回る。
column5: Follow the roads as shown by the arrows.
column11: Follow the roads as shown by the arrows.

column4: 先に２周した方が勝ちだ。
column5: Whoever's in front after two laps wins.
column11: Whoever is in front after 2 laps, wins.

column4: じゃあ、スタートするぜ！
主人公＿ちょっとした驚き

あんたも
グランプリに出るのかい？
column5: You're taking part in the Grand Prix too?
column11: You're taking part in the Grand Prix too?

column4:
なにせ今回のグランプリは
過去最大規模だからな。
column5: This year's Grand Prix is supposed to be the greatest yet.
column11: Anyhow, this year's Grand Prix is supposed to be the greatest yet.

column4: 世界中の人形が集まる。
column5: Puppets have gathered from around the world.
column11: Mechs have gathered from around the world.

column5: ...Which means I've got no choice but to take part!
column11: Which leaves me with no choice but to take part.

column4: で、練習相手を探してるんだ。
column5: So, I've been looking for someone to practice against.
column11: So, I've been looking for someone to practise with.
